column1: Le Cannet (Occitan: Lo Canet) is a commune of the Alpes-Maritimes department in southeastern France.
Le Cannet was part of Cannes until 1778
column2: when it was made a separate commune.

column1: Le Cannet is located on the north of Cannes
column2: on the French Riviera. The two cities form a single urban area.

column2: High-ranking official and writerIt was the home of:
